page.title: 06RECREATION
page.content: The village hall is spaceous and well decorated.It provides an ideal place for various village activities and meetings as well as a base for the local play group and youth club.The W.I. meets thereonce each month and the parish meeting is held twice each year.Highlights of the year include the Harvest Tea after the Sunday schoolsports and the Christmas fete.Dances and discos bring together people from outlying farms and many people hold their wedding reception there.A library van visits the village each fortnight.
